actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Slams or one Bite and one Slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 60/240' one target 21 (3d10+5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it is knocked prone (DC 15 Str negates prone).

actions.name: Chew Rock
actions.desc: Thoroughly crushes a rock in its large maw reducing it to rubble.

actions.name: Gravel Spray
actions.desc: Spits out a 15 ft. cone of crunched up rock. All in area make a DC 15 Dex save taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage or half damage if made. Can use this action only if it has used Chew Rock within the past min.

reactions.name: Rock Catching
reactions.desc: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the rockchewer ogre the ogre can with successful DC 10 Dex save catch the missile and take no bludgeoning from it.

special_abilities.name: Stone Chomper
special_abilities.desc: The rockchewer ogre deals double damage to stone objects and structures with its bite attack.
